About Me

I’m pursuing a B.S. in Computer Science at George Mason University and gaining real-world experience through a remote developer internship.

Skilled in Python, Java, C, C#, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and R, with experience using Django, ASP.NET, Entity Framework, and Android Studio. I adapt quickly to new tools and environments.

Experienced in designing relational databases (SQL, MySQL), working with JSON, and building responsive, accessible frontends linked to robust backends.

Familiar with AWS, networking protocols (TCP/IP, DNS), firewall setup, Linux/Unix systems, and Git version control.

Eager to grow in software development, systems design, and AI/ML, while strengthening fundamentals like algorithms and data structures.

I approach technology with curiosity and precision, building scalable, user-friendly solutions across backend, frontend, and network layers.

Career Goals

  • Build impactful systems and tools that scale.
  • Craft clean, accessible UIs for better UX.
  • Contribute to AI, systems, or cloud projects.
  • Lead and mentor in technical teams.

Skills Summary

  • Full-stack: Django, ASP.NET, Bootstrap
  • SQL, API design, and backend systems
  • HTML/CSS/JS for responsive UIs
  • Git/GitHub, CI/CD, teamwork
Philosophy
